name: Summertime SPLASH Fish Volleyball Paint DELUXE
name_original: Summertime SPLASH Fish Volleyball Paint DELUXE
description:
Step into the squishy and spongey shoes of an ambulant hamburger! Create art by violently repelling fish with your soft buns while dancing to cyber-yokelcore, and take a selfie at the beach with your beautiful artwork!

Created as an entry for the Emojiam and exhibited at the Netherworld Arcade as part of the November Artscade weird trash art games exhibition, and an honourable mention at The 2018 Freeplay Independent Games Festival Awards.

Controls
- Left/Right Arrows - Move
- Space - Bop the fish back into the air! Don't let it drop on the ground or you'll RUIN the fish.

Options
- F8 and F9 - Adjust screen size (windowed mode)
- F11 - Enable & disable fullscreen

Completion stats
- Jam Length - 1 week (23 Jun - 30 Jun 2017)
- Development Length - ~5 days

SFX Content packs used - All SFX have been composited from or modified from their original sources;

  • Soniss GDC Game Audio Bundle #1, alternative link here
  • Soniss GDC Game Audio Bundle #2
  • Soniss GDC Game Audio Bundle #3
  • Universal Sound FX

Music created in garageband by yours truly, the fishboy

N.B. intro music and title credits are from a previous game jam
